title: Brandon Pizer
text: Hello! My name is Brandon Asano Pizer and I am student at Colorado State University studying ecosystem science and sustainability with a minor in geospatial information systems. My passion is climate change and I am working towards a career in environmental work, more specifically carbon management. I also have grown to like GIS and hope to incorporate it in my future work. It is really nice to meet you!

title: Projects
text:
As of right now I am working to refine this website using Rstudio and GitHub.
This is my first ever project working with Quarto so the learning curve has been quite steep. However, I am learning many useful skills such as being able differentiate between file types, edit website attributes in .qmd documents, understanding file paths, and many more skills!
